summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether asynchronous operations are allowed during parts of ASP.NET request processing when they are not expected.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether asynchronous operations are allowed during parts of ASP.NET request processing when they are not expected.

value.span: 当异步 API 在不是预期的时间使用时 ASP.NET 将引发异常，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if ASP.NET will throw an exception when the asynchronous API is used at a time when it is not expected; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未将此标志设置为`true`，当它检测到误用异步 API 的应用程序时，ASP.NET 将引发异常。If this flag is not set to `true`, ASP.NET will throw an exception when it detects the application misusing the async API. 如果你尝试在部分中的请求处理管道，其中异步操作不需要，调用异步方法，或者没有仍未完成的异步工作时异步模块或处理程序发出信号，完成，则可以发生此问题。This can occur if you try to call an asynchronous method during a part of the request processing pipeline where asynchronous operations are not expected, or if there is still outstanding asynchronous work when an asynchronous module or handler signals completion. 此行为旨在作为网络安全，以让你知道在早期，是否你在编写异步代码不符合预期模式，并且可能具有负的负面影响中。This behavior is meant as a safety net to let you know early on if you're writing async code that doesn't fit expected patterns and might have negative side effects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性需要中的集成的管道模式[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]并且至少.NET Framework 版本 3.0。The property requires the integrated pipeline mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework version 3.0. 如果可能，该属性返回值。When available, the property returns a value. 值属性指示在哪个事件实例当前正在处理请求。The value of the property indicates which event in the instance is currently processing the request. 属性不应设置。The property is not intended to be set. 相反，通过来设置[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]ASP.NET 管道中的请求的处理过程中。Instead, it is set by [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] during the processing of the request in the ASP.NET pipeline. 设置属性将导致编译错误。Setting the property will result in a compilation error. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定哪一个事件正在处理处理当前请求的对象。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine what event of the object that is handling the current request is being processed. 在示例中，事件处理程序处理的多个事件对象，与属性确定每个事件处理调用哪些代码。In the example, the event handler handles several events of the object, and the property determines what code is invoked for each event being handled. remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的集成模式仅支持属性[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]并且至少.NET Framework 3.0。The property is only supported with the integrated mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework 3.0. 如果可能，该属性返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否在事件对象已完成处理。When available, the property returns a Boolean value that indicates whether an event in the object has finished processing. 属性不应设置。The property is not intended to be set. 相反，它由提供[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]到每个通知的 ASP.NET 运行时。Instead, it is provided by [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] to the ASP.NET runtime for each notification. 设置属性将导致编译错误。Setting the property will result in a compilation error. 在方案中其中的多个事件对象由一个事件处理程序处理，则可以使用属性结合枚举准确确定其中在当前的应用程序生命周期请求是。In scenarios where multiple events of the object are handled by one event handler, you can use the property in combination with the enumeration to precisely determine where in the application lifecycle the current request is. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定的事件时对象已完成处理所有关联的事件处理程序。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine when an event of the object has finished processing all the associated event handlers. 在此示例中的自定义事件处理程序处理的多个事件对象，与属性用于确定调用哪些代码处理特定事件之后。The custom event handler in this example handles several events of the object, and the property is used to determine what code is invoked after a specific event is handled. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供以编程方式访问的属性和方法类。The property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the class. 因为 ASP.NET 页包含对的默认引用命名空间 (其中包含类)，你可以引用的成员而无需使用完全限定的类参考将.aspx 页上。Because ASP.NET pages contain a default reference to the namespace (which contains the class), you can reference the members of on an .aspx page without using the fully qualified class reference to . 例如，你可以使用`Request.Browser`用于获得客户端浏览器的功能。For example, you can use `Request.Browser` to get the capabilities of the client browser. 但是，如果你想要使用的成员从 ASP.NET 代码隐藏模块，你必须包括对引用模块和对这两个当前处于活动状态的请求/响应上下文的完全限定的引用命名空间中与类在你想要使用。However, if you want to use the members of from an ASP.NET code-behind module, you must include a reference to the namespace in the module and a fully qualified reference to both the currently active request/response context and the class in that you want to use. 例如，在代码隐藏页必须指定完全限定的名称`HttpContext.Current.Request.Browser`。For example, in a code-behind page you must specify the fully qualified name `HttpContext.Current.Request.Browser`. > [!NOTE] > 如果你尝试使用此属性，ASP.NET 将引发异常时对象不可用。ASP.NET will throw an exception if you try to use this property when the object is not available. 例如，这是在 Application_Start 方法的 Global.asax 文件中，或者从 Application_Start 方法调用的方法中则为 true。For example, this would be true in the Application_Start method of the Global.asax file, or in a method that is called from the Application_Start method. 在该时间具有尚未创建任何 HTTP 请求。At that time no HTTP request has been created yet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供以编程方式访问的属性和方法类。The property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the class. 因为 ASP.NET 页包含对的默认引用命名空间 (其中包含类)，你可以引用的成员而无需使用完全限定的类参考将.aspx 页上。Because ASP.NET pages contain a default reference to the namespace (which contains the class), you can reference the members of on an .aspx page without using the fully qualified class reference to . 例如，你可以使用`Response.Write("some output")`要写入 HTTP 输出流的输出。For example, you can use `Response.Write("some output")` to write output to an HTTP output stream. 但是，如果你想要使用的成员从 ASP.NET 代码隐藏模块，你必须包括对引用模块和对当前处于活动状态的请求/响应上下文和中的类的完全限定的引用命名空间中你想要使用。However, if you want to use the members of from an ASP.NET code-behind module, you must include a reference to the namespace in the module and a fully qualified reference to the currently active request/response context and the class in that you want to use. 例如，在代码隐藏页必须指定完全限定的名称`HttpContext.Current.Response.Write("some output")`。For example, in a code-behind page you must specify the fully qualified name `HttpContext.Current.Response.Write("some output")`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将对资源的请求重定向到由所请求 URL 指示的一个以外的其他路径。The method redirects a request for a resource to a different path than the one that is indicated by the requested URL. 如果你必须重置虚拟路径，以便从服务器资源的客户端的请求正确解析，请使用采用此方法的重载`rebaseClientPath`参数并将参数设置为`false`。If you have to reset the virtual path so that requests from the client for server resources resolve correctly, use the overload of this method that takes the `rebaseClientPath` parameter and set the parameter to `false`. URL 重写可当你想要重新构建 Web 应用程序中的页和你想要确保已将加入书签旧 Url 的人可以仍使用它们后您移动页面的不同而不同。URL rewriting is useful when you want to restructure the pages in your Web application, and you want to make sure that people who have bookmarked old URLs can still use them after you have moved pages. URL 重写时，可用于以透明方式将请求转发到新页的位置。URL rewriting enables you to transparently forward requests to the new page location. 如果你想要使站点能够使用搜索引擎，会更加友好的用户进行了优化的 Url，更可靠的替代方法是使用 ASP.NET 路由。If you want to enable a site to use URLs that are more user-friendly and are optimized for search engines, a more robust alternative is to use ASP.NET routing. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 路由](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Routing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法，以使网站以响应不反映在网站上的文件结构的 Url。The following example shows how to use the method to enable a Web site to respond to URLs that do not reflect the file structure in the Web site. 第一个代码块是名为 RewritePath.aspx ASP.NET 网页。The first block of code is an ASP.NET Web page that is named RewritePath.aspx. 它需要查询字符串。It requires a query string. 如果你的站点的名称是 WebSite1，URL`http://localhost/WebSite1/RewritePath.aspx?page=1`浏览器中显示"第 1 页"。If the name of your site is WebSite1, the URL `http://localhost/WebSite1/RewritePath.aspx?page=1` displays "Page 1" in the browser. 遵循网页的代码块是`Application_BeginRequest`Global.asax 文件中的事件处理程序。The block of code that follows the Web page is the `Application_BeginRequest` event handler in the Global.asax file. 此代码的 Url 截获请求如`http://localhost/WebSite1/page1`并将它们转换到窗体进行处理之前所需的 RewritePath.aspx。This code intercepts requests for URLs such as `http://localhost/WebSite1/page1` and converts them to the form that is required for RewritePath.aspx before they are processed. 因此，URL `http://localhost/WebSite1/page1` RewritePath.aspx 调用带有浏览器中显示"第 1 页"的查询字符串参数。Therefore, the URL `http://localhost/WebSite1/page1` invokes RewritePath.aspx with the query-string parameter that displays "Page 1" in the browser. 如果 URL，例如`http://localhost/WebSite1/page1`收到时，重载调用，使您可以提供一个值属性，以及查询字符串参数。If a URL such as `http://localhost/WebSite1/page1` is received, an overload of is invoked that enables you to provide a value for the property as well as a query string parameter. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpContext_RewritePath#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpContext_ReWritePath/CS/rewritepath.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpContext_RewritePath#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpContext_ReWritePath/VB/rewritepath.aspx#2)] [!code-csharp[HttpContext_RewritePath#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpContext_ReWritePath/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[HttpContext_RewritePath#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpContext_ReWritePath/VB/global.asax#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由调用方法替换`rebaseClientPath`参数设置为`true`。The method is called by the method with the `rebaseClientPath` parameter set to `true`. 若要确保不会修改用于构造资源路径的虚拟路径，将设置`rebaseClientPath`参数`false`。To ensure that the virtual path that is used to construct paths to resources is not modified, set the `rebaseClientPath` parameter to `false`. 在其中你可能想要设置的常见方案`rebaseClientPath`到`false`时会需要重写 URL，并且是使用主题，并将 URL 重定向到位于比请求的资源的其他文件夹中的资源。A common scenario in which you might want to set `rebaseClientPath` to `false` is when you need to rewrite the URL, and you are using themes and redirecting the URL to a resource located in a different folder than the requested resource. URL 重写可当你想要重新构建 Web 应用程序中的页和你想要确保已将加入书签旧 Url 的人可以仍使用它们后您移动页面的不同而不同。URL rewriting is useful when you want to restructure the pages in your Web application, and you want to make sure that people who have bookmarked old URLs can still use them after you have moved pages. URL 重写时，可用于以透明方式将请求转发到新页的位置。URL rewriting enables you to transparently forward requests to the new page location. 如果你想要使站点能够使用搜索引擎，会更加友好的用户进行了优化的 Url，更可靠的替代方法是使用 ASP.NET 路由。If you want to enable a site to use URLs that are more user-friendly and are optimized for search engines, a more robust alternative is to use ASP.NET routing. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 路由](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Routing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a). ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参阅方法重载。For a code example, see the method overload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重对资源的请求定向到另一个资源，而无需更改 URL。The method redirects a request for a resource to another resource without changing the URL. `filePath`参数不包括`pathInfo`参数内容。The `filePath` parameter does not include the `pathInfo` parameter content. 为 URL http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html/tail、`filePath`参数是http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html，和`pathInfo`参数是结尾。For the URL http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html/tail, the `filePath` parameter is http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html, and the `pathInfo` parameter is tail. URL 重写可当你想要重新构建 Web 应用程序中的页和你想要确保已将加入书签旧 Url 的人可以仍使用它们后您移动页面的不同而不同。URL rewriting is useful when you want to restructure the pages in your Web application, and you want to make sure that people who have bookmarked old URLs can still use them after you have moved pages. URL 重写时，可用于以透明方式将请求转发到新页的位置。URL rewriting enables you to transparently forward requests to the new page location. 如果你想要使站点能够使用搜索引擎，会更加友好的用户进行了优化的 Url，更可靠的替代方法是使用 ASP.NET 路由。If you want to enable a site to use URLs that are more user-friendly and are optimized for search engines, a more robust alternative is to use ASP.NET routing. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 路由](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Routing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a). ## Examples 有关代码示例，包括举例说明了此方法重载时，请参阅方法重载。For a code example, including an example of this method overload, see the method overload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `filePath`参数不包括的内容`pathInfo`参数。The `filePath` parameter does not include the content of the `pathInfo` parameter. 为 URL http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html/tail、`filePath`参数是http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html，和`pathInfo`参数是结尾。For the URL http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html/tail, the `filePath` parameter is http://www.microsoft.com/virdir/page.html, and the `pathInfo` parameter is tail. 若要确保不会修改用于构造资源路径的虚拟路径，将设置`setClientFilePath`参数`false`。To ensure that the virtual path that is used to construct paths to resources is not modified, set the `setClientFilePath` parameter to `false`. 在其中你可能想要设置的常见方案`setClientFilePath`到`false`时会需要重写 URL，并且是使用主题，并将 URL 重定向到位于比请求的资源的其他文件夹中的资源。A common scenario in which you might want to set `setClientFilePath` to `false` is when you need to rewrite the URL, and you are using themes and redirecting the URL to a resource located in a different folder than the requested resource. URL 重写可当你想要重新构建 Web 应用程序中的页和你想要确保已将加入书签旧 Url 的人可以仍使用它们后您移动页面的不同而不同。URL rewriting is useful when you want to restructure the pages in your Web application, and you want to make sure that people who have bookmarked old URLs can still use them after you have moved pages. URL 重写时，可用于以透明方式将请求转发到新页的位置。URL rewriting enables you to transparently forward requests to the new page location. 如果你想要使站点能够使用搜索引擎，会更加友好的用户进行了优化的 Url，更可靠的替代方法是使用 ASP.NET 路由。If you want to enable a site to use URLs that are more user-friendly and are optimized for search engines, a more robust alternative is to use ASP.NET routing. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 路由](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Routing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a). ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参阅方法重载。For a code example, see the method overload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供以编程方式访问的属性和方法类。The property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the class. 因为 ASP.NET 页包含对的默认引用命名空间 (其中包含类)，你可以引用的成员而无需使用完全限定的类参考将.aspx 页上。Because ASP.NET pages contain a default reference to the namespace (which contains the class), you can reference the members of on an .aspx page without using the fully qualified class reference to . 例如，你可以使用`Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")`在服务器上创建 COM 对象的实例。For example, you can use `Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")` to create an instance of a COM object on the server. 但是，如果你想要使用的成员从 ASP.NET 代码隐藏模块，你必须包括对引用模块和对这两个当前处于活动状态的请求/响应上下文的完全限定的引用命名空间中与类在你想要使用。However, if you want to use the members of from an ASP.NET code-behind module, you must include a reference to the namespace in the module and a fully qualified reference to both the currently active request/response context and the class in that you want to use. 例如，在代码隐藏页必须指定完全限定的名称`HttpContext.Current.Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")`。For example, in a code-behind page you must specify the fully qualified name `HttpContext.Current.Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 ASP.NET 默认实现中，HTTP 请求处理程序指示是否它通过实现需要会话状态接口或接口。In the ASP.NET default implementation, an HTTP request handler indicates whether it requires session state by implementing the interface or the interface. 方法和枚举让你提供有关哪种类型的会话状态支持是处理请求所必需的更多详细信息。The method and the enumeration let you provide more detail about what type of session state support is required in order to handle a request. 有关详细信息，请参见 枚举。For more information, see the enumeration. 前，必须调用方法管道事件。The method must be called before the pipeline event. 或此事件发生后会发生的调用将导致异常。Calls that occur during or after this event will cause an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理程序和使用的模块中属性来实现协作取消，您可能希望禁用请求超时时，默认情况下执行 ASP.NET 的行为。此属性设置为`false`可以帮助你确保取消和清理例程将不被中断 asp.net 的情况下运行。In handlers and modules that are using the property to implement cooperative cancellation, you might wish to disable the behavior that ASP.NET performs by default when a request times out. Setting this property to `false` can help you make sure that cancellation and cleanup routines will run without being interrupted by ASP.NET. 如果将此属性设置为`false`，ASP.NET 将不自动显示"请求的操作已超时"错误页这是发生超时时。If you set this property to `false`, ASP.NET will not automatically display a "Request timed out" error page when a timeout occurs. 应用程序负责适当地设置响应内容。The application is responsible for setting the response content appropriately.
